Refactor HTML structure for category and difficulty selection, enhance accessibility with ARIA roles, and improve Firebase initialization error handling
Refactor HTML structure for category and difficulty selection, enhance accessibility with ARIA roles, and improve Firebase initialization error handling
Enhance privacy features with new privacy notice, update footer links, and improve cookie consent management; refactor HTML and CSS for better accessibility and structure
Implement FSK validation and user settings management; enhance security with rate limiting and logging; add age verification features and user account management

Enhance security by adding domain whitelist public key and private key exclusions; implement real-time security functions for game updates and violations; improve event listener management in multiplayer gameplay

Refactor multiplayer gameplay, lobby, and results modules for improved event listener management; replace custom event listener functions with standard addEventListener; enhance code readability and maintainability

Refactor multiplayer gameplay, lobby, and results modules for improved event listener management; replace custom event listener functions with standard addEventListener; enhance code readability and maintainability

Enhance Firebase integration by ensuring proper initialization before setting persistence; add validation rules for deletion requests in database; create quick reference for error fixes and deployment instructions
Claude changes
Claude changes

Enhance Firebase App Check integration, improve FSK validation, and refactor privacy and UI logic
- Add firebase-app-check-key meta tag to all HTML files; remove hardcoded fallback keys from JS configs - Update firebase-init.js and firebase-config.js to require App Check key via meta/env, improve error handling and logging - Refactor FSK validation in difficulty-selection.js for stricter server-side checks and better error feedback - Improve multiplayer-category-selection.js player readiness logic and player key handling - Refactor multiplayer-difficulty-selection.js for cleaner event listener management and dependency checks - Enhance join-game.js with robust Firebase readiness checks and improved FSK badge rendering - Update firebase-auth.js for safer initialization, promise handling, and redirect logic - Refactor privacy.js: use NocapCookies for consent, improve modal cleanup, TOC insertion, and section toggling - Improve 404.js and difficulty-selection.js for accessibility, reduced motion, and error handling - Add getPlayerKey utility, update event listener cleanup, and minor UI/UX improvements across modules

Enhance Firebase App Check integration, improve FSK validation, and refactor privacy and UI logic
- Add firebase-app-check-key meta tag to all HTML files; remove hardcoded fallback keys from JS configs - Update firebase-init.js and firebase-config.js to require App Check key via meta/env, improve error handling and logging - Refactor FSK validation in difficulty-selection.js for stricter server-side checks and better error feedback - Improve multiplayer-category-selection.js player readiness logic and player key handling - Refactor multiplayer-difficulty-selection.js for cleaner event listener management and dependency checks - Enhance join-game.js with robust Firebase readiness checks and improved FSK badge rendering - Update firebase-auth.js for safer initialization, promise handling, and redirect logic - Refactor privacy.js: use NocapCookies for consent, improve modal cleanup, TOC insertion, and section toggling - Improve 404.js and difficulty-selection.js for accessibility, reduced motion, and error handling - Add getPlayerKey utility, update event listener cleanup, and minor UI/UX improvements across modules
Refactor Cloud Functions tests for improved isolation and coverage; add proxyquire for dependency mocking, enhance FSK validation and privacy logic tests, and update dev dependencies
Add GitHub Actions workflow for automated Firebase Hosting and Functions deployment on main branch
Add GitHub Actions workflow for automated Firebase Hosting and Functions deployment on main branch
Add GitHub Actions workflow for automated Firebase Hosting and Functions deployment on main branch
Add GitHub Actions workflow for automated Firebase Hosting and Functions deployment on main branch
Add GitHub Actions workflow for automated Firebase Hosting and Functions deployment on main branch
Update Firebase deployment step to use --force flag in GitHub Actions workflow
Improve Firebase initialization robustness and set Functions region to europe-west1
Improve Firebase initialization robustness and set Functions region to europe-west1
Improve Firebase initialization robustness and set Functions region to europe-west1

Refactor Cloud Functions to use europe-west1 region and enhance security logic
- Set region to europe-west1 for all relevant Cloud Functions - Improve age verification checks for FSK categories using RTDB cache - Update account deletion logic for more robust data handling and audit trail - Enhance rapid update detection and violation logging in realtime-security - Improve error handling and logging for cleanup and notification functions - Update settings to refresh and display FSK access badges after age verification

Update account deletion logic for improved reliability and dependency management
- Update firebase-admin and firebase-functions dependencies to latest versions - Set deploy and logs npm scripts to use --project prod for production safety - Refactor account-deletion.js for clearer logic, improved error handling, and concise logging - Simplify authorization and email notification flows in account deletion functions - Enhance scheduled deletion processing and cleanup routines for better maintainability
Update age verification logic to require authentication and merge custom claims
Add Cloud Function to check user premium status with token and server-side claims
Add Cloud Function to check user access for content categories based on claims
Update Firebase imports to use v1 API and improve multiplayer module initialization logic
Improve Firebase initialization checks and add utility for dependency waiting across modules
Improve Firebase initialization checks and add utility for dependency waiting across modules
Improve Firebase initialization checks and add utility for dependency waiting across modules
add JMStV age rating file (.well-known/age-de.xml) and allow deployment
Update hosting public directory to 'public' and adjust ignore patterns in firebase.json
